img_summary: The image is likely depicting a key item from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically the "Pungent Flesh Chunk." This item is categorized as legendary and is described as flesh torn from a foe that emits a pungent reek, potentially attracting yaoguais. It is obtained by defeating the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair, located in Yellow Wind Ridge. The item is used beneath the arena where these bosses are fought, on the cliff edge, to summon the First Prince of Flowing Sands, an optional boss in Yellow Wind Ridge.
